name: Baklava Oatmeal
description: Healthy oatmeal with baklava flavors. Honey, walnuts and warm spices make breakfast feel like dessert.

instructions.instruction: Bring milk to a simmer in medium pot.
Add butter, honey, cinnamon, cardamom and vanilla.
Top with walnuts, pistachios and extra honey drizzle.

tips: Honey and butter combo is key for baklava taste.
Pistachios are essential for authentic flavor.
Cardamom is common in Middle Eastern desserts.
Reduce honey for a less sweet version.
storageInfo: Best served fresh. Flavor diminishes next day.
servingSuggestion: Serve warm for breakfast or as a dessert.
variations: Use dates to sweeten instead of honey.
Use coconut milk for vegan version.
Add sliced banana for extra nutrition.
